title: /eth/v1/beacon/blinded_blocks BAD_REQUEST: Unsupported endpoint version: v1
body:
## Description

Teku sends requests to `/eth/v1/beacon/blinded_blocks` on lighthouse and the below error occurs.

It might be related to #4262 or #4473 but because it's slightly different than both of those open issues, I wanted to open this issue just in case it's a different bug.

I disabled ssz blocks now on teku but cannot confirm if this solves the issue. If not it would be good to know before I find out during another block proposal.

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid params response from Beacon Node API (url = http://<domain>:<port>/eth/v1/beacon/blinded_blocks, status = 400, message = BAD_REQUEST: Unsupported endpoint version: v1)
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.ResponseHandler.defaultBadRequestHandler(ResponseHandler.java:129) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.ResponseHandler.handleResponse(ResponseHandler.java:93) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.AbstractTypeDefRequest.executeCall(AbstractTypeDefRequest.java:149) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.AbstractTypeDefRequest.postOctetStream(AbstractTypeDefRequest.java:142) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.SendSignedBlockRequest.sendSignedBlockAsSsz(SendSignedBlockRequest.java:85) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.SendSignedBlockRequest.sendSignedBlockAsSszOrFallback(SendSignedBlockRequest.java:76) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.SendSignedBlockRequest.sendSignedBlock(SendSignedBlockRequest.java:68) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.OkHttpValidatorTypeDefClient.sendSignedBlock(OkHttpValidatorTypeDefClient.java:87) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.lambda$sendSignedBlock$13(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:282) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:82) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.sendRequest(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:483) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.lambda$sendRequest$34(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:478) ~[teku-validator-remote-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:74) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$createRunnableForAction$1(ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.java:124) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-23.6.1.jar:23.6.1]
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:?]
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:?]
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:?]
```

## Version

Docker version v4.3.0 (on Ubuntu 22.04)

## Present Behaviour

Block proposal fails because endpoint responds with 400 Unsupported endpoint version: v1

## Expected Behaviour

Working endpoint /eth/v1/beacon/blinded_blocks

## Steps to resolve

Hopefully disabling teku ssz blocks helps. Cannot confirm yet.
